geopolitics.title: Starmer on thin ice after historic blow to Labour from Greens
geopolitics.description: British prime minister Keir Starmer pledged to fight political “extremes” on the right and left on Friday after his Labour Party suffered a humiliating election defeat to the left-wing Green Party in an area it had dominated for almost a century.
